personal.summary: A results-driven Global Implementation Manager and Solutions Architect with over a decade of experience in AI-driven automation, SaaS solutions, and digital transformation. Recognized for strategic vision and thought leadership, I have led cross-functional and global teams to deliver scalable, enterprise-grade technology solutions. Adept at driving organizational change, mentoring talent, and fostering a culture of innovation, I have consistently delivered measurable business value through AI and automation initiatives. My work includes successful implementation of predictive analytics, AI-powered chatbots, and workflow automation that have resulted in significant revenue growth, cost savings, and enhanced customer satisfaction. I am committed to continuous learning and staying at the forefront of emerging AI trends and responsible AI practices.
